text: [Music]
power well power comes in so many ways
and I guess um although I always think
that I hate power um I do understand
that all of us in order to survive need
control which in one sense can translate
into Power um now for me the kind of
power that I like to exert is through
writing because uh I think writing and I
think
ideas are a way of resisting
reality resisting the tyranny of reality
um when you write about um uh you you
cannot control reality you cannot
control where you were born uh what name
you are given what language you first
start to speak so many things are not
from you uh but when you give your own
version of it like in my new book I I
experiment with something that I never
thought I would which is a personal
Memoir but I realize that the most
difficult thing is not power or control
in the social or political sense but
power over
yourself to understand your your
weaknesses to be able to admit to them
to to to to to control those aspects of
yourself that you don't love you know or
or you don't respect um so for me the
idea of writing as power is not again a
politicized idea the way some schol uh
academics claim for example if you're
Jane Austin you're writing to
imperialist Powers I think writing
transcends its own time place and
prejudices even the prejudices of the
author yeah uh I don't know if you want
me to go on or not with that I I I bring
the example usually of fitgerald fist
Gerald could not control his urges about
the riches you know he loved and and and
partly his life was destroyed uh by um
the fascination with wealth and the
wealthy but you read The Great
Gatsby and it is the most stunning
condemnation of the wealthy you know the
that
Insight he might have been drinking um
with with Tom and Daisy in real life and
wanting to have what they have but when
he comes to writing The Great Gatsby
they're the
villains they are the careless people
who swipe things under the carpets make
messes and then other people get you
know clean up after them so in this way
Fitzgerald no matter what class he
belongs to or wants to belong to what
prejudices he has surpasses himself
transcends himself and and and and and
transcends his own time so that sort of
power is what I I would like to have to
transcend myself you know
